message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. I think this is a great price considering the value it will bring to you.

Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I appreciate you being flexible.  I'm really interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'd be willing to pay $10,000 for it.  What do you think?

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still a bit above my minimum. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11,500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value the product will bring to you.
